price: 28. (Muuse) wuxuu yidhi: Waa Rabbiga bariga iyo galbeedka iyo inta u dhexeysa, haddaad wax fahmeysaan.
arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbu al-mashriqi wal-maghribi wamā baynahumā in kuntum taʿqilūna
